comments:
The Ant UI tests were failing with the following NPE. The line of code causing 
the NPE looked like:

IPluginDescriptor descriptor = Platform.getPlugin
("org.apache.xerces").getDescriptor(); //$NON-NLS-1$

I found that on the first call to #getPlugin(..), null was returned. On the 
second call, a plug-in was returned.

I can reproduce this. Only at the second time we properly initialize the plugin
descriptor's plugin reference.

This does not happen for other plug-ins because they have their bundle manifests
automatically generated and thus use the PluginActivator, which calls itself
PluginDescriptor#getPlugin during startup.
what is involved in fixing it?

Created an attachment (id=7028)
proposed patch for this bug

Needs to be reviewed.

Released a simpler fix that will be in i20031202. Changes in the patch submitted
above still need to be reviewed/released.

Reducing priority but keeping open so we remember to review the auto-activation
story in the compatibility layer.
